events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

A Rebel operative tracked the stolen guns to a swamp behind an Imperial facility. It seems Bossk has arranged a deal for protection. Knewing you won't be able to smuggle these weapons back out, you've packed light - except for the explosives.

Staying low-profile, you make it into the lower level of the facility. The swamp is guarded from the outside, but nobody would be crazy enough to try what you're about to. You set the charges and blast your way into the service tunnels.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: {-} The walls between these spaces containing difficult terrain do not block adjacency, counting spaces, line of sight, or movement.
{-} The walls between these spaces containing difficult terrain do not block adjacency, counting spaces, line of sight, or movement.

eventActions.tbText:
The swamp outside is full of dangerous hollows and marshes.

{-} The walls between the green highlighted spaces containing difficult terrain do not block adjacency, counting spaces, line of sight, or movement.
{-} When a figure enters one or more spaces containing difficult terrain, that figure suffers 1 {H}.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
It is too dark to see what is going on in the tunnels.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters one of the red highlighted spaces, click "Enter Tunnels".

eventActions.tbText:
The corridors of the facility are narrow and badly lit. You can't see too far ahead, but you advance anyway.

{-} Imperial figures cannot be optionally deployed within 2 spaces of a hero. If this happens, place the Imperial figure 2 spaces away.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the tunnels (red highlighted spaces), select the red highlight and click "Enter Tunnels".
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel enters the tunnels.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The walls between the green highlighted spaces containing difficult terrain do not block adjacency, counting spaces, line of sight, or movement.
{-} When a figure enters one or more spaces containing difficult terrain, that figure suffers 1 {H}.
{-} Imperial figures cannot be optionally deployed within 2 spaces of a hero. If this happens, place the Imperial figure 2 spaces away.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the tunnels (red highlighted spaces), select the red highlight and click "Enter Tunnels".
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel enters the tunnels.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You look up from the wreckage of the last weapons to see stormtroopers moving in from their guard positions in the swamp. Recognizing you won't win a fight outside an Imperial facility, you spring for your extraction point. Rebels can rest a little easier knowing the balck market lost some of its supply.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

With Imperials closing in from the swamp and the facility above, you decide to leave before being captured. Sloshing through the swamp you hear the hiss of pursuit, yet you arrive at your ship unharmed. You're alive, but Bossk is well armed and on the hunt.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">Bossk</color> (Born Hunter) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
The tunnels are narrow and dimly lit. You have barely entered when two snarling Trandoshans raise their weapons.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
It is too dark to see what is going on in the tunnels.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters one of the red highlighted spaces, click "Enter Tunnels".

eventActions.tbText: Outside the tunnels, you can see the swampy marsh better now. Bossk has hidden the weapon caches here.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Bossk has hidden a cache of weapons here.

{-} A Rebel figure can attack a stockpile (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). A hero can interact with a stockpile to destroy it.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent stockpiles. A Rebel figure can attack a stockpile (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). A hero can interact with a stockpile to destroy it.
{-} The Rebels win when all stockpiles are destroyed.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent stockpiles. A Rebel figure can attack a stockpile (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}). A hero can interact with a stockpile to destroy it.
{-} When a figure enters one or more spaces containing difficult terrain, that figure suffers 1 {H}.

{-} The Rebels win when all stockpiles are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
The stockpile's destruction urges your enemies to charge you even more vicious than before.

{-} The Imperial figure with the highest figure cost that can attack attacks {rebel}.

events.eventText:
"I paid them well. Uselesss Imperialsss."

Bossk charges in from a guard post in the swamp. He moves effortlessly through the murky waters, intent on protecting his stock. For a moment, you wonder if you've made a mistake by challenging the Trandoshan in his element.

eventActions.customText: {-} <color="red">Bossk</color> tries to end his activation on a space containing difficult terrain.

eventActions.tbText: {-} While <color="red">Bossk</color> is defending, while on a space containing difficult terrain, apply +1 {F} to the defense results.
